app.name: Chocolate DOOM for Wii
app.short_description: Port of Chocolate DOOM to the Wii!
app.long_description:
Now you can play id Software's DOOM chocolate style on your Wii!
AN ORIGINAL WII CLASSIC CONTROLLER IS REQUIRED FOR THIS GAME
This port is compatible with the following IWAD's:
- Chex Quest - HACX - Twitch 'n Kill v1.2 (Registered Version ONLY) - FreeDOOM v0.8 (PHASE 2 ONLY) - DOOM BETA v1.4 - DOOM BETA v1.5 - DOOM BETA v1.6 - DOOM Shareware v1.0 - DOOM Shareware v1.1 - DOOM Shareware v1.2 - DOOM Shareware v1.25 (Sybex Release) - DOOM Shareware v1.666 - DOOM Registered v1.1 - DOOM Registered v1.2 - DOOM Registered v1.6 - DOOM Registered v1.8 - DOOM Registered v1.9 (THE ULTIMATE DOOM) - DOOM II - Hell on Earth v1.666 (English Release) - DOOM II - Hell on Earth v1.666 (German Release) - DOOM II - Hell on Earth v1.7 - DOOM II - Hell on Earth v1.8 (French Release) - DOOM II - Hell on Earth v1.9 - FINAL DOOM - The Plutonia Experiment (Original Release) - FINAL DOOM - The Plutonia Experiment (Anthology Release) - FINAL DOOM - TNT Evilution (Original Release) - FINAL DOOM - TNT Evilution (Anthology Release)
Use the Wiimote to choose your IWAD.
Press A to select the device / WAD file. Press B to go back in the menu. Use the cursors to scroll up / down in the list. Finally, press button 1 to load the game.
Upon startup you have to be patient as the game checks the IWAD being loaded.
This Wii-Release also includes PWAD loading possibilities.
